properties.description: Our focus is to help people of all ages in the community We have board games for adults and toys and crèche area for children. Pet Friendly.

properties.address: Old Mill Road, Kilmarnock, East Ayrshire KA1 3AN
properties.description: Open from Renew KBC wellbeing cafe. Open to all over the age of 18 years. Activities are based around the 5 ways to wellbeing which promote good mental and emotional health. Our cafe is a warm, safe space where it's OK not to be OK. A community space for sharing a variety of hobbies and activities, which are all free. You can come and relax, chat, keep warm or enjoy the peace in our quiet area.
properties.title: Kilmarnock Baptist Church

properties.address: 20 Sturrock Street , Kilmarnock , East Ayrshire KA1 3AH
properties.description: Open from 19/10/22. Thursday - aimed at those who are homeless or at risk of homelessness Monday we are open for free tea and coffee until 2.00pm. Soup and sandwich served from 11.30 till 1.00 (optional for a small charge). Home League (group for all) begins at 2.00, all are welcome. Wednesday is our ‘Knit and natter’ group.
